about_the_game:
A SOOTHING JOURNEY

Loom Path is a calming and enjoyable 2D platformer designed to help you unwind. In a world filled with complex and challenging games, Loom Path offers a peaceful escape. With simple controls and a captivating atmosphere, it deserves a place in everyone’s collection.

DISCOVER THE LOOM PATH

Loom Path invites you to embark on a serene journey through mesmerizing pixel landscapes. Designed as a meditative escape, this 2D platformer blends tranquility and engaging gameplay into an experience that soothes your mind while keeping your fingers busy.

SIMPLE YET SATISFYING

Say goodbye to frustration and hello to simplicity. With intuitive controls and thoughtfully designed levels, Loom Path ensures players of all skill levels can jump in and enjoy the adventure without stress.

A VISUAL AND AUDITORY DELIGHT

Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant pixel art paired with a calming soundtrack that enhances every moment of your journey. Loom Path isn’t just a game—it’s a feast for your senses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 or AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
